item.title: Azure Resource Group Enterprise Scale Landing Zone queries
item.description: This is just a quick post. I am slowly working on building a collection of Resource Graph Queries - they can be found here and will grow over time.

item.title: Bicep Troubleshooting
item.description: Some basic “troubleshooting” with Azure Bicep So, let me start with this. The team and the community behind Azure Bicep are amazing.

item.title: Azure CLI - List Locations and Peers
item.description: How to use the Azure CLI to list Azure Locations and their peers So this will be a “quick post” that shows some great functionality within the Azure CLI with az account list-locations.
